00013 /*
00014   ##############  PCI Config Registers ###############
00015 */
00016 #define    PCI_CFG_COMMAND_STATUS        0x04
00017 #define    PCI_CFG_CACHE_LINE            0x0C
00018 #define    PCI_CFG_TGT_IMPL              0x40
00019 #define    PCI_CFG_19                    0x4C
00020 #define    PCI_CFG_MASTER_ARB_CTL        0x58
00021 #define    PCI_CFG_CAPABILITIES          0xE0
00022

00027 /*
00028   ##############  BAR0 Registers ################
00029 */
00030 #define    PCI_BAR1_INDEX_START          0x100
00031 #define    PCI_BAR1_OFFSET               0x4
00032 
00033 /*------------------ REQUEST QUEUE ---------------*/
00034 #define    PCI_IQ_DOORBELL_START         0x080
00035 #define    PCI_IQ_INSTR_COUNT_START      0x84
00036 #define    PCI_IQ_OFFSET                 0x8
00037 
00038 
00039 /*------------------ OUTPUT QUEUE ----------------*/
00040 #define    PCI_PKTS_SENT_START           0x040
00041 #define    PCI_PKTS_CREDITS_START        0x044
00042 #define    PCI_PKTS_SENT_INT_LEV_START   0x048
00043 #define    PCI_PKTS_SENT_TIME_START      0x04C
00044 #define    PCI_PKTS_OFFSET               0x10
00045 
00046 
00047 /*-------------------- DMA QUEUE -----------------
00048    No macros are defined for these registers since the definition for 
00049    38XX and 56XX are different. 56XX has a 1 register for both Time and
00050    Pkt count interrupt and 1 register for both DMA 0 & 1 Counts.
00051 */
00052 #define    PCI_DMA_CNT_START             0x0A0
00053 #define    PCI_DMA_INT_LEV_START         0x0A4
00054 #define    PCI_DMA_TIME_START            0x0B0
00055 
00056 #define    CN3XXX_DMA_CNT(dq)                      \
00057            (PCI_DMA_CNT_START + (dq * 8))
00058 
00059 #define    CN3XXX_DMA_PKT_INT_LEVEL(dq)            \
00060            (PCI_DMA_INT_LEV_START + (dq * 8))
00061 
00062 #define    CN3XXX_DMA_TIME_INT_LEVEL(dq)           \
00063            (PCI_DMA_TIME_START + (dq * 4))
00064 
00065 
00066 
00067

00069 #define    PCI_INT_SUM                   0x030
00070 #define    PCI_INT_ENABLE                0x038
00071 
00072 #define    PCI_INT_SUM_2                 0x198
00073 #define    PCI_INT_ENABLE_2              0x1A0
00074

00080 #define    CN3XXX_WIN_RD_DATA_LO            0x020
00081 #define    CN3XXX_WIN_RD_DATA_HI            0x024
00082

00084 #define    CN3XXX_WIN_WR_ADDR_HI            0x004

00232 
00233 #define    PCI_CTL_STATUS_2_PCIX_MODE    0x00002000
00234 #define    PCI_CTL_STATUS_2_64BIT_BUS    0x00001000
00235 #define    READ_BURST_SIZE               64
00236 #define    WRITE_BURST_SIZE              0   /* Write as 0 to set to 128 */
00237 #define    PCI_BURST_SIZE        ((WRITE_BURST_SIZE << 7) | READ_BURST_SIZE )
00238 
00239 /* USE CSR for ES, NS, RO. No snoop or relaxed ordering.
00240    Endian-swap data. Round-robin priority for queues. */
00241 #if  __CAVIUM_BYTE_ORDER == __CAVIUM_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00242 #define    NPI_INPUT_CTL_MASK            (0x0000000000000050ULL  | (1 << 22))
00243 #else
00244 /* For big-endian systems, enable 64-bit endian-swap for gather list and
00245    instruction reads. */
00246 #define    NPI_INPUT_CTL_MASK            (0x0000000000000052ULL  | (1 << 22)) 
00247 #endif
00248 #define    NPI_CTL_ENABLE_ALL_INPUT_MASK 0x0003C00000000000ULL
00249 
00250 
00251 
00252 /*------------------ OUTPUT QUEUE ----------------*/
00253 
00254 /* USE CSR for ES, NS, RO. No snoop or relaxed ordering. endian-swap data */
00255 /* Use info-ptr to store len/data for Output port */
00256 #if  __CAVIUM_BYTE_ORDER == __CAVIUM_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00257 #define    NPI_OUTPUT_CONTROL_MASK_0     0x0000000041010000ULL
00258 #define    NPI_OUTPUT_CONTROL_MASK_1     0x0000000402020000ULL
00259 #define    NPI_OUTPUT_CONTROL_MASK_2     0x0000004004040000ULL
00260 #define    NPI_OUTPUT_CONTROL_MASK_3     0x0000040008080000ULL
00261 #else
00262 /* For big-endian systems, enable 64-bit swap for slist[0..3] reads */
00263 #define    NPI_OUTPUT_CONTROL_MASK_0     0x0000000041010004ULL
00264 #define    NPI_OUTPUT_CONTROL_MASK_1     0x0000000402020040ULL
00265 #define    NPI_OUTPUT_CONTROL_MASK_2     0x0000004004040400ULL
00266 #define    NPI_OUTPUT_CONTROL_MASK_3     0x0000040008084000ULL
00267 #endif
00268 
00269 /* In addition, also enable Round-robin priority for queues. */
00270 #define    NPI_OUTPUT_CTL_MASK    \
00271        ( (1ULL << 48) |  NPI_OUTPUT_CONTROL_MASK_0 | NPI_OUTPUT_CONTROL_MASK_1 \
00272                 | NPI_OUTPUT_CONTROL_MASK_2 | NPI_OUTPUT_CONTROL_MASK_3 )
00273 
00274 #define    NPI_CTL_ENABLE_ALL_OUTPUT_MASK  0x003C000000000000ULL
00275 
00276 
00277 
00278 /*   DROQ interrupts */
00279 #define    DROQ0_CNT_INT             0x00020000
00280 #define    DROQ0_TIME_INT            0x00200000
00281 #define    PCI_INT_DROQ0_MASK   ( DROQ0_TIME_INT )
00282 
00283 #define    DROQ1_CNT_INT             0x00040000
00284 #define    DROQ1_TIME_INT            0x00400000
00285 #define    PCI_INT_DROQ1_MASK   ( DROQ1_TIME_INT )
00286 
00287 #define    DROQ2_CNT_INT             0x00080000
00288 #define    DROQ2_TIME_INT            0x00800000
00289 #define    PCI_INT_DROQ2_MASK   ( DROQ2_TIME_INT )
00290 
00291 #define    DROQ3_CNT_INT             0x00100000
00292 #define    DROQ3_TIME_INT            0x01000000
00293 #define    PCI_INT_DROQ3_MASK   ( DROQ3_TIME_INT )
00294 
00295 
00296 #define    PCI_INT_DROQ_MASK    \
00297             ( PCI_INT_DROQ0_MASK  | PCI_INT_DROQ1_MASK | PCI_INT_DROQ2_MASK \
00298               | PCI_INT_DROQ3_MASK )
00299 
00300 
00301 
00302 
00303 #define    DMA0_CNT_INT             0x02000000
00304 #define    DMA0_TIME_INT            0x08000000
00305 #define    DMA0_FORCE_INT           0x20000000
00306 #define    DMA1_CNT_INT             0x04000000
00307 #define    DMA1_TIME_INT            0x10000000
00308 #define    DMA1_FORCE_INT           0x40000000
00309 
00310 #define    PCI_INT_DMA0_MASK    ( DMA0_TIME_INT )
00311 #define    PCI_INT_DMA1_MASK    ( DMA1_TIME_INT )
00312 
00313 #define    PCI_DMA_FORCE_INT    (DMA0_FORCE_INT | DMA1_FORCE_INT)
00314 
00315 
00316 /* PCI_INT_ENB_MASK will not have force int enabled by default.
00317  insmod enables force int in addition to int_enb_mask */ 
00318 #define    PCI_INT_DMA_MASK     (PCI_INT_DMA0_MASK | PCI_INT_DMA1_MASK)
00319 
00320 
00321 
00322 
00323 
00324 
00325 /* MSI specific interrupt summaries are not enabled */
00326 #define    PCI_INT_PCI_ERR_MASK          0x0000FFFF
00327 
00328 
00329 
00330 /*  Interrupt Enable Mask. */
00331 /* Above Error mask + all summary for o/p queue and DMA q enabled.
00332    RSL_INT summary bit is not enabled. */
00333 #define    PCI_INT_ENB_MASK   \
00334            ( PCI_INT_DROQ_MASK | PCI_INT_DMA_MASK | PCI_INT_PCI_ERR_MASK )
00335 
00336 
00337 
00338 /*---------------   PCI BAR1 index registers -------------*/
00339 
00340 /* BAR1 Mask */
00341 #define    PCI_BAR1_ENABLE_CA            1
00342 #define    PCI_BAR1_ENDIAN_MODE          OCTEON_PCI_64BIT_SWAP 
00343 #define    PCI_BAR1_ENTRY_VALID          1
00344 #define    PCI_BAR1_MASK                 (  (PCI_BAR1_ENABLE_CA << 3)   \
00345                                           | (PCI_BAR1_ENDIAN_MODE << 1) \
00346                                           | PCI_BAR1_ENTRY_VALID )
00347 
00348 #define    INVALID_MAP    0xffff
